The current action will be interrupted: Trenutno dejanje bo prekinjeno. Želite nadaljevati?
An error occurred. Please try again late: Prišlo je do napake, prosimo poskusite ponovno kasneje.
An error occurred while sending the resu:
Med pošiljanjem rezultatov je prišlo do napake.
Aplikacija bo shranila rezultate in poskusila znova pozneje.
The registration couldn't be completed: Registracije ni bilo mogoče dokončati. Prosimo poskusite kasneje.
Could not resolve the hostname: Imena gostitelja ni bilo mogoče razrešiti.
UUID odjemalca je bil kopiran v odložišče.
Ta rezultat je na voljo samo lokalno.
A new version is available. Would you li: Na voljo je nova različica. Ali jo želite namestiti?
The new version is ready for installatio: Nova različica je pripravljena za namestitev.
Delete local data description: S tem boste odstranili vaše lokalne podatke, kot so jezikovne nastavitve in zgodovino meritev. Aplikacija se bo zaprla. Želite nadaljevati?
Local data settings description: Lokalni podatki vključujejo nastavitve, ID uporabnika, zgodovino meritev
Tests are conducted repeatedly until the: Meritve se izvajajo večkrat, dokler se ročno ne ustavijo
The loop measurement has expired: Ponavljajoče meritve so potekle po %0 minutah
The app was suspended. The last running: Aplikacija je bila začasno ustavljena. Zadnja meritev, ki se je izvajala, je bila prekinjena
CPU usage is higher than %0%. Results ma: Obremenitev procesorja je večja od %0%. Rezultati so lahko popačeni.
The interval must be between %0 and %1 m: Interval mora biti med %0 in %1 minut
Basic information on the certified measu: SL-Basic information on the certified measurement
Title: SL-Title
Is it the first measurement cycle?: SL-Is it the first measurement cycle?
Further information on the certified mea: SL-Further information on the certified measurement
Since this is the first measurement cycl: SL-Since this is the first measurement cycle, we ask you to answer the following questions in order to understand the circumstances of the measurement. For further measuring cycles, answering these questions is no longer necessary.
Please describe the location of your Int: SL-Please describe the location of your Internet access
What kind of Internet access do you have: SL-What kind of Internet access (DSL, cable, radio, other) do you have? Which modem or which router do you use? If possible, specify an exact type designation.
Please describe your device used for mea: SL-Please describe your device used for measuring
Describe the computer that you are runni: SL-Describe the computer that you are running the test with. How is the computer connected to the modem/router? Are your devices connected wired (LAN) or wireless (WLAN)? Are the electrical wires in your house also used to transmit data (PowerLAN)? For WLAN: Are the test device and modem / router in the same room?
Please send us a photo of the modem: SL-Please send us a photo of the modem / router, the computer (if possible together on one picture) and photos of the individual type designations. If possible, please also send a photo of the wall socket
The file is not an image: SL-The file is not an image
An error occurred during test: Med preizkusom je prišlo do napake
